item.description:
Design Venturers Western Mass is organizing an event/discussion around the use of color to create excellence in design, this coming year's forecasted design and color trends, and the effective use of color principles. For more information and to RSVP:
http://www.meetup.com/Design-Venturers-Western-Mass/events/83477562/

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Using Color Effectively in Design, Color Trends: A Roundtable Discussion
